verses.verse: In the third<WH7992> month,<WH2320> when the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> were gone forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> the same<WH2088> day<WH3117> came<WH935> they into the wilderness<WH4057> of Sinai.<WH5514>

For they were departed<WH5265> from Rephidim,<WH4480> <WH7508> and were come<WH935> to the desert<WH4057> of Sinai,<WH5514> and had pitched<WH2583> in the wilderness;<WH4057> and there<WH8033> Israel<WH3478> camped<WH2583> before<WH5048> the mount.<WH2022>

And Moses<WH4872> went up<WH5927> unto<WH413> God,<WH430> and the LORD<WH3068> called<WH7121> unto<WH413> him out of<WH4480> the mountain,<WH2022> saying,<WH559> Thus<WH3541> shalt thou say<WH559> to the house<WH1004> of Jacob,<WH3290> and tell<WH5046> the children<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478>
Ye <WH859> have seen<WH7200> what<WH834> I did<WH6213> unto the Egyptians,<WH4714> and how I bore<WH5375> you on<WH5921> eagles'<WH5404> wings,<WH3671> and brought<WH935> you unto<WH413> myself.

Now <WH6258> therefore, if<WH518> ye will obey my voice indeed,<WH8085> <WH8085> <WH6963> and keep<WH8104> <WH853> my covenant,<WH1285> then ye shall be<WH1961> a peculiar treasure<WH5459> unto me above all<WH4480> <WH3605> people:<WH5971> for<WH3588> all<WH3605> the earth<WH776> is mine:

And ye<WH859> shall be<WH1961> unto me a kingdom<WH4467> of priests,<WH3548> and a holy<WH6918> nation.<WH1471> These<WH428> are the words<WH1697> which<WH834> thou shalt speak<WH1696> unto<WH413> the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

And Moses<WH4872> came<WH935> and called<WH7121> for the elders<WH2205> of the people,<WH5971> and laid<WH7760> before their faces<WH6440> <WH853> all<WH3605> these<WH428> words<WH1697> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> him.

And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> answered<WH6030> together,<WH3162> and said,<WH559> All<WH3605> that<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> hath spoken<WH1696> we will do.<WH6213> And Moses<WH4872> returned<WH7725> <WH853> the words<WH1697> of the people<WH5971> unto<WH413> the LORD.<WH3068>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> Lo,<WH2009> I<WH595> come<WH935> unto<WH413> thee in a thick<WH5645> cloud,<WH6051> that<WH5668> the people<WH5971> may hear<WH8085> when I speak<WH1696> with<WH5973> thee, and believe<WH539> thee forever.<WH5769> And Moses<WH4872> told<WH5046> <WH853> the words<WH1697> of the people<WH5971> unto<WH413> the LORD.<WH3068>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> Go<WH1980> unto<WH413> the people,<WH5971> and sanctify<WH6942> them today<WH3117> and tomorrow,<WH4279> and let them wash<WH3526> their clothes,<WH8071>

And be<WH1961> ready<WH3559> against the third<WH7992> day:<WH3117> for<WH3588> the third<WH7992> day<WH3117> the LORD<WH3068> will come down<WH3381> in the sight<WH5869> of all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> upon<WH5921> mount<WH2022> Sinai.<WH5514>

And thou shalt set bounds<WH1379> <WH853> unto the people<WH5971> round about,<WH5439> saying,<WH559> Take heed<WH8104> to yourselves, that ye go not up<WH5927> into the mount,<WH2022> or touch<WH5060> the border<WH7097> of it: whosoever<WH3605> toucheth<WH5060> the mount<WH2022> shall be surely put to death:<WH4191> <WH4191>

There shall not<WH3808> a hand<WH3027> touch<WH5060> it, but<WH3588> he shall surely be stoned,<WH5619> <WH5619> or<WH176> shot through;<WH3384> <WH3384> whether<WH518> it be beast<WH929> or<WH518> man,<WH376> it shall not<WH3808> live:<WH2421> when the trumpet<WH3104> soundeth long,<WH4900> they<WH1992> shall come up<WH5927> to the mount.<WH2022>
And Moses<WH4872> went down<WH3381> from<WH4480> the mount<WH2022> unto<WH413> the people,<WH5971> and sanctified<WH6942> <WH853> the people;<WH5971> and they washed<WH3526> their clothes.<WH8071>
And he said<WH559> unto<WH413> the people,<WH5971> Be<WH1961> ready<WH3559> against the third<WH7969> day:<WH3117> come<WH5066> not<WH408> at<WH413> your wives.<WH802>

And it came to pass<WH1961> on the third<WH7992> day<WH3117> in the morning,<WH1242> that there were<WH1961> thunders<WH6963> and lightnings,<WH1300> and a thick<WH3515> cloud<WH6051> upon<WH5921> the mount,<WH2022> and the voice<WH6963> of the trumpet<WH7782> exceeding<WH3966> loud;<WH2389> so that all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> that<WH834> was in the camp<WH4264> trembled.<WH2729>

And Moses<WH4872> brought forth<WH3318> <WH853> the people<WH5971> out of<WH4480> the camp<WH4264> to meet<WH7125> with God;<WH430> and they stood<WH3320> at the nether part<WH8482> of the mount.<WH2022>

And mount<WH2022> Sinai<WH5514> was altogether<WH3605> on a smoke,<WH6225> because<WH4480> <WH6440> <WH834> the LORD<WH3068> descended<WH3381> upon<WH5921> it in fire:<WH784> and the smoke<WH6227> thereof ascended<WH5927> as the smoke<WH6227> of a furnace,<WH3536> and the whole<WH3605> mount<WH2022> quaked<WH2729> greatly.<WH3966>

And when<WH1961> the voice<WH6963> of the trumpet<WH7782> sounded long,<WH1980> and waxed louder and louder,<WH2388> <WH3966> Moses<WH4872> spoke,<WH1696> and God<WH430> answered<WH6030> him by a voice.<WH6963>

And the LORD<WH3068> came down<WH3381> upon<WH5921> mount<WH2022> Sinai,<WH5514> on<WH413> the top<WH7218> of the mount:<WH2022> and the LORD<WH3068> called<WH7121> Moses<WH4872> up to<WH413> the top<WH7218> of the mount;<WH2022> and Moses<WH4872> went up.<WH5927>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> Go down,<WH3381> charge<WH5749> the people,<WH5971> lest<WH6435> they break through<WH2040> unto<WH413> the LORD<WH3068> to gaze,<WH7200> and many<WH7227> of<WH4480> them perish.<WH5307>
And let the priests<WH3548> also,<WH1571> which come near<WH5066> to<WH413> the LORD,<WH3068> sanctify themselves,<WH6942> lest<WH6435> the LORD<WH3068> break forth<WH6555> upon them.

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto<WH413> the LORD,<WH3068> The people<WH5971> cannot<WH3808> <WH3201> come up<WH5927> to<WH413> mount<WH2022> Sinai:<WH5514> for<WH3588> thou<WH859> chargedst<WH5749> us, saying,<WH559> Set bounds<WH1379> <WH853> about the mount,<WH2022> and sanctify<WH6942> it.

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, Away,<WH1980> get thee down,<WH3381> and thou shalt come up,<WH5927> thou,<WH859> and Aaron<WH175> with<WH5973> thee: but let not<WH408> the priests<WH3548> and the people<WH5971> break through<WH2040> to come up<WH5927> unto<WH413> the LORD,<WH3068> lest<WH6435> he break forth<WH6555> upon them.
So Moses<WH4872> went down<WH3381> unto<WH413> the people,<WH5971> and spoke<WH559> unto<WH413> them.
